tags: Permanent Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR).
Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR).
full_summary:
### Tender Notice: Temporary Help Services

#### Contract Information

* Title: Temporary Help Services for Computer Application Support
* Solicitation Number: S4781518
* Reference Number: cb-292-89636871
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-22 at 14:00:00 (UTC)
* Amendment Number: 3
* Amendment Date: 2024-01-22
* Contracting Entity: Department of National Defense
* Contracting Entity Address: 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON, K2H8G1, Canada

#### Tender Details

* Notice Type: RFP (Request for Proposal) against Supply Arrangement
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Regions of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Contract Description

The Department of National Defense is seeking temporary help services for computer application support. This requirement is open only to supply arrangement holders who qualified under the Computer Application Support stream and category.

A list of invited SA holders is available on the Canada Buys website. The minimum security level required for resources is Secret.

#### Tender Documents

Tender documents, including the request for proposal, can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website at:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29512/s4781518—rfp-(english-version).pdf (English)
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29512/s4781518—dp-(french).pdf (French)

#### Contact Information

Please contact CFSG(O-G) Temp Help for more information:

* Email: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 971-7955
* Address: 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON, K2H8G1, Canada

Note: The procurement is expired as per the listed tender closing date. However, contractors can still seek additional information about this contract opportunity.
